title: 107_hr344
content: Social Security Disability Waiting Period Elimination Act of 2001 - Amends title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to: (1) eliminate the five-month waiting period for disability insurance benefit payments and for widow's and widower's insurance benefits based on disability. (2) eliminate the waiting period for commencement of periods of disability. And (3) eliminate the 24 month waiting period for entitlement to Hospital Insurance program benefits under part A of SSA title XVIII (Medicare).
